issue.message: `SharedPreferences.edit()` without a corresponding `commit()` or `apply()` call

Duplicate id @+id/active_elections, defined or included multiple times in layout/fragment_home.xml: [layout/fragment_home.xml defines @+id/active_elections, layout/fragment_home.xml => layout/data_placeholder_shimmer_layout.xml defines @+id/active_elections]
